message.content:
cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.SE, cs.CY 

This paper discusses the challenge of designing explainable software-driven systems, which is a topic that falls under the sub-categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI), human-computer interaction (cs.HC), machine learning (cs.LG), software engineering (cs.SE), and cybersecurity (cs.CY). The paper proposes a characterization of explainable systems, which is a fundamental aspect of designing such systems, and this is relevant to all of these sub-categories. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.AI, cs.HC, and cs.LG, followed by cs.SE and cs.CY.
